      • BatteryRequest

        public BatteryRequest(android.content.Context applicationContext)
        Creates a new BatteryRequest instance.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - The application Context of the app. You can get this value from activity with ContextWrapper.getApplicationContext() or from fragment you can get the activity and then the context with Fragment.getActivity().

    • Method Detail

      • allBatteries

        public void allBatteries(int offset)
                  throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new all batteries request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        offset - Gets the next 20 entries from with the offset as first entry. Starting at 0.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • addBattery

        public void addBattery(String designation,
                       int amount,
                       String drones)
                throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new add battery request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        designation - The designation of the battery.
        amount - The amount of the battery.
        drones - The drones which can use this battery separated by ,. format: 2,3,4
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • showBattery

        public void showBattery(int batteryId)
                 throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new show battery request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        batteryId - The id of the battery.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • editBattery

        public void editBattery(int batteryId,
                        String designation,
                        int amount,
                        String drones)
                 throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new edit battery request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        batteryId - The id of the battery.
        designation - The designation of the battery.
        amount - The amount of the battery.
        drones - The drones which can use this battery separated by ,. format: 2,3,4
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • deleteBattery

        public void deleteBattery(int batteryId)
                   throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new delete battery request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        batteryId - The id of the battery.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null
